rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {MKW1120}
Unit was previously coded {MKB146, MKC2300, MKF3301, MKT3301, MKW3301%, MKX3301}

description: An in-depth analysis of the marketing techniques that apply to service organisations and industries including service design and delivery, customer service, service quality measurement and internal marketing.
